plot: A loose spoof of Martin Scorsese films, this story concerns a juice-loan collector whose job becomes difficult when his mafia family is bought out by a major corporation.
title: Raging Goodfellow
plot_es: A loose spoof of Martin Scorsese films, this story concerns a juice-loan collector whose job becomes difficult when his mafia family is bought out by a major corporation.
plot_en: A loose spoof of Martin Scorsese films, this story concerns a juice-loan collector whose job becomes difficult when his mafia family is bought out by a major corporation.
